snippet: The United Nations secretary general, Ban Ki-moon, said Thursday that he was optimistic that progress on curbing greenhouse gas emissions would be made at a conference in Lima, Peru.
abstract: United Nations Sec Gen Ban Ki-moon offers hope that representatives at global warming conference in Lima, Peru, will make progress on agreement to curb greenhouse gas emissions.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations secretary general, Ban Ki-moon, said Thursday that he was optimistic that progress on curbing greenhouse gas emissions would be made at a conference in Lima, Peru.

headline.main: Secretary General Expresses Optimism About Climate Meeting
headline.print_headline: Secretary General Expresses Optimism About Climate Meeting
